summary: REQ-19 appears implemented in NumberMatrixView.tsx by setting a blue grid container background, using light/darker orange cell backgrounds based on data.given, and forcing black text for digits. However, the diff also includes modifications to frontend-file-summaries.txt and project_state.json which were not requested by the BuildRequest.

hallucinated_features.description: Updated repository metadata/summary files (frontend-file-summaries.txt) unrelated to the requested Number Matrix color changes.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest only asks to update UI colors in frontend/src/game/renderers/NumberMatrixView.tsx and does not mention updating summary/metadata files.

hallucinated_features.description: Updated project state metadata (project_state.json) unrelated to the requested Number Matrix color changes.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest does not request any changes to project_state.json; only the Number Matrix renderer color styling is requested.
